title: LeSean McCoy Signs; Mailbag
itunes:title: LeSean McCoy Signs; Mailbag
description:
A bunker filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal bring you all of the latest news around the NFL including LeSean McCoy's signing, Damien Williams opting out and Ngakoue holding out. The heroes answer some mailbag questions at the end of the show.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
